attributes.action: Encourage distribution of goods by rail, thus reducing traffic and the use of LGV’s on our roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the government seem keen to reduce the amount of traffic on our roads, How about getting the government to look at bringing in some sort of LGV policy, were by more of our goods would be transported by rail like in times gone by, thus reducing the amount of traffic on our roads, and of course this at the same time would do some good to the environment.
